summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Fifty-second Street from Eighth Avenue N.W. to Eleventh Avenue N.W. in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No.17337 creating Local Improvement District No. 1628 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
